auth.instructions: Follow these steps to complete GitHub App authentication:
auth.open_url: Open this URL in your browser: {{url}}
auth.waiting: Waiting for browser authentication to complete...
auth.browser_open_failed: Failed to open browser automatically. Please open the URL manually.

setup.private_key_prompt: Enter the path to your private key file (or press enter to skip)
setup.auto_complete: GitHub App setup was automatically completed.

info.title: GitHub App Configuration
info.not_configured: GitHub App is not yet configured. Please run 'autopr github-app setup' first
info.failed: Failed to fetch GitHub App information: {{error}}

reset.confirm: Are you sure you want to reset the GitHub App configuration? This will remove all GitHub App settings.
reset.failed: Failed to reset GitHub App configuration: {{error}}

private_key.description: Import private key file for GitHub App
private_key.prompt: Enter the path to your private key file:
private_key.no_config: GitHub App is not yet configured. Please run 'autopr github-app setup' first

token.expired: Authentication token expired. Please try again.
token.success: Retrieved GitHub App token via server.
token.failed: Failed to retrieve GitHub App token from server.

error.missing_installation_id: GitHub App installation ID is missing
error.token_missing: No token in installation token response
error.app_info_failed: Failed to get GitHub App information: {{status}}
error.installation_verification_failed: Failed to verify GitHub App installation
error.private_key_required: GitHub App private key is required for this operation. Please run 'autopr github-app setup' to set up your private key.

installations.not_found: No app installation information found. Checking app information...
installations.fetch_failed: Failed to retrieve GitHub App installation list from server.

ui.install_not_found: This GitHub App is not installed on your account.
